kid_name.name: Kid Name
kid_name.description: Optional filter to generate the report for one kid only.

report_language.name: Report Language
report_language.description: Optional language code for report text. Falls back to selected kid language (when kid_name is set) and then English.

report_title.name: Report Title
report_title.description: Optional title override for the markdown output.

notify_service.name: Notify Service
notify_service.description: Optional notify target (for example notify.family) to deliver the report.

output_format.name: Output Format
output_format.description: Return markdown only, html only, or both markdown and html in the response payload.

reset_chores_to_pending_state.name: Reset Chores To Pending State
reset_chores_to_pending_state.description: Manually reset all chores to pending state, removing claims and approvals.

reset_transactional_data.name: Reset Transactional Data
reset_transactional_data.description: Reset runtime/transactional data while preserving configuration (kids, chores, rewards, etc.). An automatic backup is created before reset as kidschores_data_timestamp_reset in the .storage directory. Use scope to target specific kids or domains. Requires confirm_destructive parameter set to true as a safety mechanism.

confirm_destructive.name: Confirm Destructive
confirm_destructive.description: Must be set to true to confirm you want to proceed with the reset. This is a safety mechanism.

scope.name: Scope
scope.description: Reset scope: 'global' resets all data, 'kid' resets data for a specific kid only.

kid_name.name: Kid Name
kid_name.description: Required if scope is 'kid'. The name of the kid whose data should be reset.

item_type.name: Item Type
item_type.description: Optional filter to reset only a specific domain (e.g., just points or just chores).

item_name.name: Item Name
item_name.description: Optional filter to reset a specific item within the item_type domain.

reset_overdue_chores.name: Reset Overdue Chores
reset_overdue_chores.description: Reset overdue chore(s) back to the Pending state and reschedule them based on their recurring frequency and previous due date. You may optionally provide a chore_id (or chore_name) to reset a specific chore and optionally a kid_name to reset the chore only for that kid.

chore_id.name: Chore ID
chore_id.description: The internal ID of the chore to reset (optional if chore_name is provided).

chore_name.name: Chore Name
chore_name.description: The name of the chore to reset (optional if chore_id is provided).

set_chore_due_date.name: Set/Reset Chore Due Date
set_chore_due_date.description: Set (or clear) the due date for a chore. Provide the chore name and, if desired, a new due date. If no due date is provided the existing due date will be cleared. The service will reject due dates set in the past. For independent chores, optionally provide a kid_name to set the due date only for that kid.

chore_name.name: Chore Name
chore_name.description: The name of the chore to update

due_date.name: Due Date
due_date.description: The new due date for the chore. Use the date/time selector to choose a valid date and time (in your local timezone). Leave empty to clear the due date.

kid_name.name: Kid Name
kid_name.description: For independent chores, specify the kid to set the due date for. If omitted, sets the due date for all assigned kids.

kid_id.name: Kid ID
kid_id.description: The internal ID of the kid. Advanced users only - use kid_name instead.

skip_chore_due_date.name: Skip Chore Due Date
skip_chore_due_date.description: Skip the current due date of a recurring chore. This service immediately reschedules the chore's due date based on its recurring frequency and resets its state to pending. Any pending claims or approvals will be removed. For independent chores, optionally provide a kid_name to skip only for that kid.

chore_id.name: Chore ID
chore_id.description: The internal ID of the chore to reset (optional if chore_name is provided).

chore_name.name: Chore Name
chore_name.description: The name of the chore to reset (optional if chore_id is provided).

kid_name.name: Kid Name
kid_name.description: For independent chores, specify the kid to skip the due date for. If omitted, skips the due date for all assigned kids.

kid_id.name: Kid ID
kid_id.description: The internal ID of the kid. Advanced users only - use kid_name instead.

mark_as_missed.name: Mark as Missed
mark_as_missed.description: When true, records this skip as a missed chore in the kid's statistics. Useful for tracking intentional skips separately from automated overdue resets.

remove_awarded_badges.name: Remove Awarded Badges
remove_awarded_badges.description: Remove all awarded badges for all kids. Optionally, provide badge name to reset a specific badge across all kids. Use kid name to reset all badges for a specific kid. Combine both to reset a specific badge for a specific kid.

kid_name.name: Kid Name
kid_name.description: The kid awarded badges will be removed from.

badge_name.name: Badge Name
badge_name.description: The name of the badge to remove.
